text: Splash is a 1984 American fantasy romantic comedy movie directed by Ron Howard, written by Lowell Ganz and Babaloo Mandel and starring Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah, John Candy and Eugene Levy. The movie is about a young man who falls in love with a mysterious woman who is secretly a mermaid. The movie was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay. The movie is the first to be released by Touchstone Pictures. Splash had received a PG-rating for some profanity and brief nudity. ==References== Category:1984 fantasy movies Category:1984 romantic comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ron Howard Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Disney movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:American romantic fantasy movies Category:Movies about brothers Category:Mad scientist movies
title: Splash (movie)
